tickets.subject: Unable to log in to mobile app

conversation.author: customer
conversation.message: I'm unable to log in to the mobile app. It keeps showing 'Invalid credentials', even though I'm entering the correct email and password.

conversation.author: agent
conversation.message: Could you please confirm your registered email address and app version? Try force-closing the app and logging in again.

conversation.author: customer
conversation.message: Email: adarsh.rawat@email.com, App Version: 3.2.1, Device: Android Samsung Galaxy S21. I've tried force-closing and reinstalling but issue persists.

conversation.author: agent
conversation.message: We found multiple failed login attempts which temporarily locked your account. I've unlocked it. Please wait 5 minutes and try again.

tickets.resolution: Account was temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Agent manually unlocked the account.

tickets.subject: How to update my profile information?

conversation.author: customer
conversation.message: I need to update my phone number and address. How can I do that?

conversation.author: agent
conversation.message: Go to Settings > Profile > Edit Profile > Update your details > Save Changes. Your information will be updated immediately.

conversation.author: customer
conversation.message: I don't see the 'Edit Profile' option. Using app version 3.1.5.

conversation.author: agent
conversation.message: You're using an older version. Please update to version 3.2.1 from the store. Alternatively, update via our website in Account Settings.

conversation.author: customer
conversation.message: Got it! I'll update the app. Thanks!

tickets.resolution: Customer was using an older app version. Guided to update the app to access Edit Profile feature.

login_issues.account_locked: Check for multiple failed login attempts. Manually unlock account. Ask customer to wait 5 minutes before retry.
login_issues.forgot_password: Guide customer to use 'Forgot Password' feature. Verify email address. Check spam folder.
login_issues.invalid_credentials: Verify email spelling. Check if account exists. Try password reset.

payment_issues.failed_transaction: Check payment gateway status. Initiate refund if amount deducted. Refund timeline: 5-7 business days.
payment_issues.payment_not_reflecting: Wait 24 hours for payment to reflect. Check bank statement. Contact payment gateway if issue persists.

app_issues.app_crashing: Ask for app version and device details. Check for latest version. Known bugs: iOS 17.2 with v3.2.0 (fixed in v3.2.1).
app_issues.app_not_updating: Clear app cache. Uninstall and reinstall. Check device storage space.
